name: Makers and Breakers
description: Known either for their intellect or their physical prowess and handiwork, these Species are crucial to the creation (or destruction) of both the foundations of society and the heights of advanced technology. For much of the Matoran Universeâ€™s history, the islands of Stelt, Xia, and Zakaz have pushed the limits of science, either independently, collaboratively, or in stark opposition to each other, as sensibilities change over the centuries.
